name: Deeper and Deeper
description:
You have fallen into the dungeon. There is no escape.

Deeper and Deeper is a procedurally-generated dungeon explorer/walking sim with two unsatisfying endings! Be sure to read the controls, since the game won't tell you how to play.  You should be able to beat this in around 10 minutes (or much faster if you play dirty). There are native downloads, but the WebGL version appears to be more stable.

This game was made in a couple of weeks for LOWREZJAM2019. Comments and feedback are appreciated.

Controls

MoveWASDLookMouseAttackLeft Mouse ButtonTalk/Close TextF
